org.openadaptor.core.transaction
Interface ITransaction

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTransaction
public interface ITransaction

Interface which describes an openadaptor Transaction.
Openadaptor can provide a wrapper around the JTA specification, or its own proprietary implementation.

Method Summary
 void commit()
          Do whatever is needed to commit the open Transaction(s).
 void delistForCommit(java.lang.Object resource)

 void rollback()
          Rollback all open transactions (if possible)
 void setErrorOrException(java.lang.Throwable t)
           
 void setRollbackOnly()
          Use to mark a transaction so that rollback is the only valid operation that can be performed.
